field.name: Growth Stages and Problems with Child Development | Counseling
It is important to follow your child’s growth. There are a few signs that can help you follow the growth and development of your child from birth to 5 years
A child should seek care at a health centre or hospital IMMEDIATELY, if the child exhibits any of the following behaviours or signs
Does not turn toward the source of new sounds or voices
Has frequent ear infections (discharge from ear, or earache)
Does not respond when you call unless child can see you
Does not talk or talks strangely
